properties.name: IROH Tenant Token or Who has XM other than one submitted
properties.description: Other XM Token to Fetch Global Xchange ID when Submitter is XM

properties.name: User_Role
properties.description:
Provide Any one. It accepts two roles. 
TenantAdmin - Having Submit Exchange Access 
XchangeManager -- Having complete Access

properties.name: Published_Author
properties.description: Published Author - Enter Email ID for Author

properties.name: Contact_Email
properties.description: Contact Email for Published Xchange

properties.name: Action
properties.description: Action should be approved or rejected

properties.name: Category_ID
properties.description:
Provide Xchange Category ID (If User Wants to add multiple category). Leave Blank if not required to provide. below syntax should be followed. 

,"cat_id",
"cat_id1"

properties.name: Token to Approve or Reject (Xchange Manager)
properties.description: Token to Approve or Reject

properties.name: Provide Input Token for Tenant Admin
Approve_Myself
properties.description: Add Approve_Myself as keyword if User one who submitted the exchange ,  himself want to approve or if user want to skip install before approval or reject

properties.name: type_of_submission
properties.description: type_of_submission is cisco, cisco_verified, or community

properties.name: External_Links

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
